app.title: BandLab ‚Äì Music Making Studio
app.description:
The free BandLab app has everything you need to start making beats ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre laying down your first loop or crafting your next global release. With this powerful music maker in your pocket, you can produce, mix, and share your beats on the go. Dive into a massive sample library, craft MIDI like a pro, and unlock next-level beatmaking tools ‚Äì all from your phone. 

Got a burst of inspiration? Instantly bring your ideas to life in our free DAW: 

‚Ä¢ Sampler ‚Äì Build a beat with 100K+ royalty-free samples from BandLab Sounds, or create custom samples by recording sounds around you. 

‚Ä¢ 300+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Audio Presets ‚Äì  Shape your sound with effects like reverb, delay, and EQ, and save your go-to presets for quick access across your projects!

‚Ä¢ Splitter ‚Äì Split any song into high-quality music stems with our free AI stem separation tool. Use it as a vocal remover, isolate instruments for practice, or get stems from any song for creative remixing, beat flips, and more. 

‚Ä¢ SongStarter ‚Äì Make beat block a thing of the past! Jumpstart your hit with royalty-free ideas from our AI beat generator. Explore unique song ideas in 11 genres like Drift Phonk and Hip-Hop, with 3 unique compositions to choose from for each generated idea. 

‚Ä¢ Drum Machine ‚Äì Create killer drum patterns effortlessly with our online sequencer. Choose from a massive library of genre-diverse drum sounds and pre-made kits to fit your vibe.

‚Ä¢ Looper ‚Äì New to beatmaking? Pick a sound pack in your favorite genre, load it up, and start building your beat or backing track in seconds ‚Äì no experience required!

‚Ä¢ 385+ Virtual MIDI Instruments ‚Äì Need hard-hitting 808s for your beats or smooth synths for your melody? Access 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to perfect your sound.

‚Ä¢ Automation ‚Äì Get precise control over your mix‚Äôs volume, panning, and effects parameters to enhance dynamics and build smoother transitions. 

‚Ä¢ Mastering ‚Äì Give your tracks the shine they deserve with presets designed by multi-Platinum and Grammy-winning engineers. In just a tap, perfect your sound for streaming platforms and beyond. 

‚Ä¢ Distribution ‚Äì Release your beats globally on popular streaming platforms right from the app, and keep 100% of your earnings. 

Top BandLab features for beatmakers:

‚Ä¢  Free song cloud storage 
‚Ä¢  Unlimited multi-track projects 
‚Ä¢  Keep projects synced with a cross-device DAW
‚Ä¢  All-in-one music making app ‚Äì from ideation to distribution
‚Ä¢  Easy export or sharing to social media and streaming platforms

Join a thriving community of over 100M music makers and creators on the BandLab app today! 

Terms of Use: https://blog.bandlab.com/terms-of-use/ 
Privacy Policy: https://blog.bandlab.com/privacy-policy/

The free BandLab app has everything you need to start making beats ‚Äì whether you‚Äôre laying down your first loop or crafting your next global release. With this powerful music maker in your pocket, you can produce, mix, and share your beats on the go. Dive into a massive sample library, craft MIDI like a pro, and unlock next-level beatmaking tools ‚Äì all from your phone.

Got a burst of inspiration? Instantly bring your ideas to life in our free DAW:

‚Ä¢ Splitter ‚Äì Split any song into high-quality music stems with our free AI stem separation tool. Use it as a vocal remover, isolate instruments for practice, or get stems from any song for creative remixing, beat flips, and more.

‚Ä¢ Drum Machine ‚Äì Create killer drum patterns effortlessly with our online sequencer. Choose from a massive library of genre-diverse drum sounds and pre-made kits to fit your vibe.

‚Ä¢ Looper ‚Äì New to beatmaking? Pick a sound pack in your favorite genre, load it up, and start building your beat or backing track in seconds ‚Äì no experience required!

‚Ä¢ 385+ Virtual MIDI Instruments ‚Äì Need hard-hitting 808s for your beats or smooth synths for your melody? Access 330+ cutting-edge Virtual MIDI instruments to perfect your sound.

‚Ä¢ Automation ‚Äì Get precise control over your mix‚Äôs volume, panning, and effects parameters to enhance dynamics and build smoother transitions.

Join a thriving community of over 100M music makers and creators on the BandLab app today!

app.summary: Make beats anywhere on BandLab. Record, mix & produce, all from your phone.

reviews.text: Whenever I use my headphones, a delayed playback plays whenever I move or talk while editing. I need microphone access removed for it not to do this, but if I do it doesn't let me make any projects. Is this a bug? If so, please fix! I've never had this issue before the update. Other than that, I love this app! Definitely recommend.

it is really really fun and easy to use. I use it to record metal songs and stuff like that and it works really well. I like the drum machine because I don't play drums. the only thing it needs is more time signatures. it currently doesn't have 7/8 time signatures and that makes it hard to record a lot of my guitar riffs that would be in 7/8. so PLEASE ADD 7/8 PLEEEASE. other than that, I'm happy with it.

The fact that there is a free app that allows you to make make records possibly make a hit and at the very least have a place to go to practice and hone your skills making music or beats and even videos all of that You can't say too much bad about it. Yeah, it wants you to pay for a membership, so you don't have to deal with those pesky. Ads or so that you can use more fx tools or have more mastering options things like that, but just on a regular free to play deal this is the way to go rn‚ÄºÔ∏èüíØ

I love this app. It's simple yet elegant and is an excellent resources for making the content that I make. One thing though- recently I've noticed that some of the tracks I've made have audio issues. Namely, there will be a fluctuation from loud to quiet almost constantly in the track. Is there a way to fix this?

Logical UI, good instrument voicings,doesn't work with my audio interface. Update: Bought a new computer and everything works fine. Overall, I've had a very enjoyable experience with Bandlab, and I'm just about done with 10 songs. New features are added pretty regularly, and with the paid version, you get 32 tracks per song.

I'm loving BandLab, but it's not quite meeting my needs. When I'm building music with virtual instruments, it tends to get choppy when I add multiple tracks and play them back. I'd love to see some improvements on this front. Additionally, it would be awesome to have access to a variety of professional-sounding bass guitar and kick bass presets. Thanks!
reviews.replyText: Hi Jorde! Thanks for your rating. We value your feedback and we'll make sure to take this to the respective team so we can look into it. We'd love for you to share more details about this so don't hesitate to reach out to us! https://bnd.la/contact-us

reviews.text: Dear Bandlab , this is such a wonderful app. I had been using it to create professional sounding tracks, its dope.However, I have been trying to access the app since the recent update. But it keeps telling me to enter my email, I have done that and it says that it'll send a message to my email, I've checked but there's nothing there. I have deleted and reinstalled the application but it's still the same, nothing's changed. Besides that it's a great app. Please do fix this issue. Thank You.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for the review, fam! Please check your email's spam/junk folder. Please also make sure that your email domain is allowed to receive all types of emails. If you're still having issues, send us more details here! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

reviews.text: amazing app for creating music. thank you,bandlab so much for all the cool features.BARELY any ads, all fun. make a band or listen to another! there are so many possibilities in store on bandlab. ignore the bad reviews and stick to mine when i tell you, it's not ad filled,and not a paywall. it's all fun!!! I used to do soundtrap, but i deleted it because my brother needed help on bandlab. since then I never looked back. these bad reviews look super bad but really..it's awsome! thx for your time

Really great app! I make all my music with it, and it's super easy to use. I even use it to record skits and scripts for short films here because the audio effects and tracks are incredible and easy to use. I only have one issue, but it's not worth giving it a low rating. Please, please PLEASE- This would make this app unstoppable, I truly believe- if you were able to make customized instruments. Similar to BeepBox, where you have presets but can change wave type and add envelopes and such:D

Recently, every studio I go into has become very laggy in both the app and website versions (specifically a very constant problem in collaboration projects). When I play the song to listen to inside the studio it'll either freeze, stop playing the audio but still very visibly still playing on my screen and return the audio very buggy, and when recording, it will stop my recording from time-to-time and make me lose my progress. I've never had this problem before, please help.
reviews.replyText: Sorry to see the 1-star review! Can you please try clearing the app's cache files or reinstalling it? If the issue persists, send us more details and a screen recoridng here! - https://bnd.la/contact-us

app.recentChanges:
We‚Äôve fixed the volume slider lag in Studio ‚Äì mixing now feels smoother and more precise.

Publishing posts is easier too: Clip Maker now closes automatically after you hit publish, and you can still add media while link previews load.

Plus, we squashed a bunch of bugs and crashes to keep your sessions flowing without a hitch. Update now for the best experience!
app.AIReview:
BandLab ‚Äì Music Making Studio Review

Overview

BandLab, boasting over 108 million installs and a 4.67 rating, presents itself as a fully featured Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) available entirely free on mobile devices. Developed by Shimmer Acoustics, the app aims to democratize music production, providing users with tools previously only accessible through expensive professional software. The core premise ‚Äì creating beats and tracks ‚Äúanywhere‚Äù ‚Äì is compelling, especially for aspiring musicians or those seeking a portable creative outlet. Its massive user base suggests a vibrant community and ongoing development, though questions remain about whether the app truly delivers on its ambitious claims of being capable of supporting both casual experimentation and professional-level production.

Key Features

BandLab's feature set is extensive, reflecting its position as a comprehensive music making studio. Here‚Äôs a breakdown:

  • DAW Functionality: The app operates as a full DAW, allowing users to record, arrange, edit, and mix audio directly on their mobile device. Tracks are organized into projects, and time signatures can be adjusted with relative ease.
  • Sampler Library: A substantial library of over 100,000 samples is included, spanning various genres and instrument types ‚Äì drums, synths, pianos, orchestral instruments, and more. The sampler‚Äôs interface is relatively intuitive, allowing users to trigger samples via MIDI or by drawing on the screen.
  • MIDI Support: Users can create and manipulate MIDI data within BandLab. This allows for playing virtual instruments, controlling effects, and creating complex arrangements with a keyboard or MIDI controller (via Bluetooth).
  • Effects Suite: A selection of built-in audio effects are available, including EQ, compression, reverb, delay, distortion, and more. While the quality isn‚Äôt always on par with professional plugins, they offer sufficient tools for shaping sound.
  • Collaboration Tools: BandLab's core strength lies in its collaborative features. Users can easily create shared projects, inviting others to contribute their own parts ‚Äì a feature heavily promoted within the app ecosystem.
  • Loop Cloud Integration: Seamless integration with LoopCloud provides access to an even larger library of loops and samples through a subscription service (paid).
  • Social Features: The app is deeply integrated with social networking, allowing users to share their creations, follow other musicians, and discover new music within the BandLab community.

Strengths

  • Truly Free: The complete suite of features available in BandLab are completely free ‚Äì a significant advantage over many competing DAWs that require expensive subscriptions or one-time purchases.
  • Collaboration Focused: The collaborative workflow is exceptionally well executed, facilitating creative partnerships and fostering a sense of community. The ability to instantly share projects with others is a powerful motivator for creativity.
  • Accessibility: BandLab lowers the barrier to entry into music production. It's incredibly easy to pick up and start making beats, even without prior experience. The intuitive interface contributes significantly to this accessibility.
  • Large Sample Library: The included 100K+ sample library provides a solid foundation for beatmaking, covering a wide range of musical styles.
  • Active Community: The large user base translates into a vibrant community offering support, tutorials, and inspiration.

Areas for Improvement

  • Audio Quality of Built-in Effects: While adequate for basic mixing, the quality of BandLab‚Äôs built-in effects is noticeably lower than professional plugins found in dedicated DAWs. Users may find themselves relying heavily on external VST plugins (through a limited integration) or third party apps to achieve desired sonic results.
  • Performance on Low-End Devices: With 108,695,397 installs, BandLab has undoubtedly been optimized for various devices, but performance can be sluggish on older or less powerful smartphones, particularly when working with large sample libraries or complex arrangements.
  • Workflow Complexity (Advanced Users): While easy to learn initially, the depth of features can become overwhelming for experienced producers accustomed to more traditional DAWs. Navigation and some advanced editing functions could benefit from streamlining.
  • Limited Export Options: The export options are somewhat restrictive, primarily focused on sharing within the BandLab ecosystem. More robust export formats (e.g., WAV, MP3 at various bitrates) would be beneficial for users wanting to distribute their music outside of the app.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, particularly for beginners. The interface is clean and intuitive, with a logical layout that makes it easy to find and use different features. The touch-based controls are well-implemented, providing accurate and responsive feedback. The learning curve is gentle ‚Äì users can quickly start creating basic beats without needing extensive technical knowledge. However, as mentioned earlier, mastering the more advanced features and navigating complex projects requires a steeper learning curve. The constant push for community collaboration, while beneficial in some ways, can sometimes feel intrusive or disruptive to focused creative work.

Value for Money

BandLab‚Äôs value proposition is exceptional considering its cost ‚Äì zero. It provides access to a complete music production studio on a mobile device, rivaling many paid applications. The LoopCloud subscription offers an additional layer of value for those seeking an expanded sample library and premium content. While professional-grade plugins will likely require separate purchase, BandLab effectively serves as an excellent entry point into music production.

Conclusion

BandLab is a remarkably impressive app that successfully democratizes music creation on mobile devices. Its free access, collaborative features, and intuitive interface make it ideal for beginners and casual users alike. While not without limitations ‚Äì particularly concerning the quality of its built-in effects and potential performance issues on lower-end hardware ‚Äì BandLab offers an exceptional value proposition. For anyone interested in exploring music production on a budget, or seeking to collaborate with other musicians, BandLab is undoubtedly worth downloading and trying. Its continued development and vibrant community suggest a bright future for this innovative app.
